title: Tale of the Mismarca Kingdom - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Psychological   Romance   Shounen   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Personality Changes
author: Hayashi Tomoaki   林トモアキ
description:
Mahiro is the prince of the Mismarca Kingdom, he won’t study nor learn swordsmanship, he is a lazy prince who only plays around. His Royal Guard Pariel would always scold him for his behavior.

And towards that Mismarca Kingdom an elite squadron of the Gran Marsenal Empire is approaching. Their leader is Lunas, a warrior princess, the Third Imperial Princess.

All of Mismarca’s vassals voiced their will to fight to make a last stand. But, there is one man who cowardly asks, “Why don’t we have a talk with them?”

What kind of fate awaits the Mismarca Kingdom and its useless Prince, Mahiro?>
